step_feedback.feedback: Great job sitting or standing comfortably! Try to keep your body muscles a bit tighter as you inhale, like you're gently squeezing.
You're placing your hands on your abdomen well. Remember to relax your muscles completely as you exhale, imagining pushing the fluid out.
Excellent! Keep that visualization of fluid moving to your chest as you inhale and tighten your body. You're doing great.
Fantastic! Continue to relax your muscles as you exhale and visualize pushing fluid out. This helps with drainage.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with your deep breathing exercises! Remember to gently tighten your whole body as you inhale and relax completely as you exhale to help with fluid drainage.
